start.message: Hi! I’m your support bot. Sorry you’re having trouble. Can you describe the issue?

validations.errorMessage: Please provide a short description of the issue.

suggest.message: Let’s try restarting your device. Did this solve the problem? (yes/no)

validations.errorMessage: Please reply with yes or no.

resolved.message: Great! Thank you for your patience. I’ll close this chat now.

escalate.message: Thanks for trying that. I’ll record your issue and follow up with support.
